name: 'RPG' Crawler
description: This is a simple crawler game made for my BSU Game Development class. I used Blender to create the models and Unreal Engine for everything else. The goal is to find and shoot 2 targets to open the door and win. Your health is always decreasing and your stamina depletes when jumping. There is a health pickup to increase your health and a stamina pickup to increase your stamina. I used the an RPG asset created by Fred The Fantastic from blendswap.com.
